title: Ping issues
body: My ISP is Rogers, i get a 65 ping on league, my download is 500 and my upload is 50, for some reason every couple games my ping is randomly 85-90 and it stays solid, but it adds a massive delay and actually feels like a 130ish ping, my internet is super consistent and this never happens on any other game. Any solutions? also every 3rd game i get a bugsplat. atm im using hextech repair client to reinstall to see if it helps.

replies.body: It almost sounds like you might be having problems with something called packet loss. Essentially that means parts of your connection are getting lost before they reach our servers. Try running a quick traceroute so I can get an image of how your connection looks on its way. You can use [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to run that trace to 104.160.131.1 and post the results here for me!

Here: https://gyazo.com/b79fa0f90a771d8f3f1c5268b8623ae7 it is also worth noting that i flushed my dns and switched to the public google dns, i also have all processes closed now, and i reinstalled with hextech client as support requested, since then, my ping is now always an 85 and instead of being steady it will go between 85-100 and constantly fluctuates, and i never get the 67 ping i used to get.

Thanks for that info! Since there wasn't really any packet loss in that trace something else might be impacting your games to make it feel sluggish. You mentioned having reinstalled using the hextech repair tool as support requested, and it looks like you've been working with a tech agent in a ticket. Keep talking with them, and they'll be able to look into your net logs and such a lot closer than I can here on the boards and figure out what's going on!
